timeline.message: Move adding diagnostics for action invocation a level up
Add test to test, action instead of expression

timeline.bodyText: Any clue on why do we need to special-case start-acton here?
timeline.author: SupunS

replies.bodyText: no Idea, that's just the way the node is getting transformed. it doesn't follow that path for anything else.
replies.author: m36dot

replies.bodyText: no i meant, what was the reason to special case the start-action?
replies.author: SupunS

replies.bodyText: well when we have a start action inside a wait action the old parser doesnt return an expressionstmt node but rather a workersendNode. so thats the reason
replies.author: m36dot

replies.bodyText: even when the original node is an expressionstatement node
replies.author: m36dot
